data.title: Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ (U)(Venom) ROM < NDS ROMs
meta_keywords: Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ (U)(Venom)
data.meta_description: Zombie BBQ is a scrolling shooter for the Nintendo DS in which you fight against zombie versions of fairy tale creatures. You can play as one of two characters, one being Little Red Riding Hood with a gun. Yes, people will do anything for money.
